meta.title: About me - Alanis
meta.description: Learn more about my experience as a full-stack developer and my passion for creating exceptional web applications.

title: About me
subtitle: My passion for web development
description: I am a full-stack developer passionate about creating web applications that not only work well, but also provide an excellent user experience.

hero.title: About me
hero.description: Hello! I'm Emmanuel, a Mexican web developer. I have a passion for developing modern web applications and I'm constantly learning something new. Also, I enjoy helping others grow and develop alongside me.

section.title: The best solution for your business.
section.description: Worried about technical matters? Don't worry, we'll provide you with the best solutions so your business runs smoothly. You'll always have the backing of our first-class experience.

features.friendly: Ideal for people without technical knowledge

provenCode.title: Proven Code
provenCode.description: Our error-free code ensures optimal performance and functionality for your software applications. Trust our experienced team to deliver quality results without unexpected issues.

firstClass.title: First-Class Support
firstClass.description: We're here to answer questions, clarify concerns, and provide solutions for a seamless experience.

flexible.title: Flexible Plans
flexible.description: If you need something special, don't worry; we'd be happy to assist you and offer the best option according to your needs.

stats.title: My Track Record
stats.subtitle: Numbers that reflect commitment and experience

services.title: Services I Offer
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions tailored to your needs

webApp.title: Web Application Development
webApp.description: Custom web applications built with modern frameworks like React and Next.js for optimal performance and user experience.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Complete online store solutions with secure payment processing, inventory management, and seamless checkout experiences.

api.title: API Development & Integration
api.description: RESTful APIs and third-party integrations to connect your systems and automate workflows efficiently.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Speed optimization, SEO improvements, and Core Web Vitals enhancements to boost your site's performance.

testimonials.title: What Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Feedback from those who have worked with me

items.quote: Emmanuel delivered our project on time and exceeded our expectations. His attention to detail and communication throughout the process was exceptional.
items.name: Maria Garcia

items.quote: Working with Emmanuel transformed our online presence. Our website is now faster, more modern, and our customers love the new experience.
items.name: Carlos Rodriguez

items.quote: Professional, reliable, and highly skilled. Emmanuel understood our business needs and delivered a solution that perfectly fits our requirements.
items.name: Ana Martinez

jsonLd.description: Mexican web developer specialized in React, Next.js and TypeScript
